betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oWe can guarantee you have a sample of this with you right now! It's in your stomach as part of gastric acid.§r

Obtain §9Hydrochloric Acid§r by mixing §aHydrogen§r and §aChlorine§r.
This acid is also obtained from as waste from a lot of reactions involving §aChlorine§r. Depending on your setups, you may never need to produce it directly.


§cNote:§r We have a bot command on our Discord, called $medicine: "Do not attempt this in real life, it is not only illegal but also stupidly dangerous".
This applies to toying with chemicals. Please don't do it.
